Description:
Ripe For Renovation!
A prized corner position and a sought after location close to the Yarra Parklands and Dights Falls provide an exciting and profitable project for builders and developers (STCA). This former corner store currently offers four principal rooms plus kitchen and bathroom with a rear northerly orientation. There is potential easy car access.
Let your imagination run riot as you create your plans to revitalise this remarkable property and take it into the twenty first century!
Peter Bennett : 0419 502 466

Description:
Genuine Large Townhouse
Moments from the Merri Creek Trail at the end of the street and being on the edge of the city this property ticks the location box.
Catch as much sun as you want on the roof top terrace. This property also comprises of :
*2 double sized bedrooms with built in robes
*Ensuite to master
*Second bathroom
*Open plan lounge/ kitchen/ dining level with balcony
*2 secure car parks
* Separate laundry
Featuring air conditioning to both bedrooms and living areas, polished floor boards, dishwasher and stone top benches to wet areas.
Currently rented on a monthly tenancy for $550pw
Call Adam for further details on 0416102725

Description:
Spectacularly Spacious Family Oasis
A double-fronted family discovery with desirable northerly rear and spectacular city view; this large and light-filled two-level residence is superbly renovated delivering abundant space, copious storage, separate studio and secure off street parking. Assured serenity and seclusion in a sleepy street near schools, Yarra parklands, cafes and train station complements this exceptional Edwardian designed for spacious family living and alfresco entertaining. Features four double bedrooms with built-in-robes (upstairs children's retreat with second bathroom, lounge and balcony views), vast living and dining zone with HeatnGlo gas fireplace and bifold doors, gourmet stone kitchen (water filter), huge family spa bathroom, heating/cooling, polished floorboards, open fireplaces, plantation shutters, low-maintenance gardens and remote-control carport.
Vincent Taylor : 0417 586 271

Description:
The Block To Build Your Work Of Art
The quintessential 'blank canvas' awaiting your creative flourish; sharpen your pencils, unroll the tracing paper and get planning as inspiration for that innovative masterwork abounds with this outstanding parcel of level land. Desirable dimensions of 188.5 sqm (approx) with rear ROW provide the space to design and make an indelible mark with a stunning new signature residence (STCA). Location wise, this exceptional inner-city block is a smart choice that's strategically set in the Clifton Hill Village just metres to hectares of Merri Creek and Yarra River parkland, trails, popular cafes, specialty shops, schools and train station. Now is the time and this is the big-picture place to make a significant architectural statement!
Vincent Taylor : 0417 586 271

Description:
Beautifully Renovated Village Retreat
A lifestyle revelation that brilliantly unfolds from attractive tuckpointed facade and fabulous upstairs retreat to secluded north-facing garden; a stylish contemporary interior highlights the beautiful transformation of this solid brick Edwardian quietly located just metres to Merri Creek parkland and trails. Featuring double-glazing, heating/cooling, alarm, polished Jarrah floors, stone finishes and attic storage, a superb three bedroom and study layout offers family flexibility in a manageable package close to schools, train station and inner-city shopping and cafes. Also includes lounge room with gas coal fireplace, light-filled living/meals area opening to decking and garden, excellent Bosch-equipped gourmet kitchen, two bathrooms (ensuite), powder room, European laundry, built-in robes, rainwater tank and workshop.
Stephen Whitelaw : 0418 616 000

Description:
Inspired Inner City
A coveted Clifton Hill address metres from the verdant Darling Gardens here ensures astute first-home buyer and investor impact. Located in a solid-brick block, this ground floor apartment boasts a private security entrance - a rare addition in a one-bedroom apartment. A thoughtful layout incorporates the separate kitchen and servery window overlooking the sunny lounge with leafy aspect, affording both privacy and space. The bedroom with built-in-robes, smart new bathroom, laundry with further storage and a covered car space plus proximity to cafes and transport enhances the attraction. Set in a sensational inner city location with a scarcity of apartments, this one ticks all the boxes.
Belinda Lindsay : 0409 853 769

Description:
Flexible Living, Fabulous Views, Sensational Lifestyle
An impressive inner-urban sanctuary just moments to the Main Yarra Trail and extensive parklands, this outstanding residence is staged over three stylish levels rising to a striking living and entertaining zone with city views. Launched by a versatile ground-floor lounge/office or extra bedroom, this secure and secluded warehouse conversion extends to a generous three bedroom, two bathroom layout including main bedroom with smart ensuite, walk-in-robe and balcony. An exciting lifestyle opportunity close to village cafes, shopping, schools and train station, this excellent contemporary home also offers spectacular open-plan living/dining area flanked by two entertainment balconies, granite kitchen with Smeg appliances, heating/cooling, video intercom, polished hardwood floors and two-car auto garage (internal).
Gary Fitzpatrick : 0437 920 972

Description:
Sought-After Address Facing Parkland
Life is literally a walk in the park with this fabulous triple-brick residence commanding one of Clifton Hill's favourite positions and best outlooks. Including dual O'Grady Street frontage, this light-filled home with preferred northern exposure stands directly opposite parkland enjoying views and immediate access to Merri Creek trails. A private entertainment deck and courtyard complement a tastefully updated interior including three bedrooms (reverse-cycle heating/cooling, ceiling fanlights, built-in-robes), living room with log heater, casual dining area, stone Smeg-appointed kitchen, stunning bathroom and double glazing. Scope to extend up for city/park vista if desired (STCA). Moments to schools, shops, cafes and transport.

Description:
Auction This Saturday at 12:30pm. View From 12:15
A COURTYARD PLUS OTHER SURPRISES
This tastefully presented ground floor one bedroom apartment has a wonderfully spacious north facing private courtyard garden.
The solidity of an older style complex of quality craftsmanship provides an entry hall opening to the generous lounge room which accesses the courtyard and allows northern light to stream throughout. A functional and funky style kitchen adjoins and there's an ample bedroom with robes and larger bathroom than normal.
Interestingly the floorplan also includes separate laundry which could be harnessed for modern living and expansion of the footprint. In very comfortable condition for living or renting but possessing the potential to become something more in this coveted locale with everything from shops, parks and transport on the doorstep whilst still including a car space.

Description:
Auction This Saturday at 11.00am
STABLE CONVERSION
The exterior of this two plus storey iron stable belies the transformation that has taken place internally to make an upside down inner city thoroughbred.
Once a stable, motor repairer and even bedding manufacturer this CGI clad home still possesses the quirkiness of its history retaining the loft doors that, when open, provide a great view from the living room. The new roller door is camouflaged with older cladding and the only hint of what’s to be found inside comes from the new glass frosted entry door.
Upside down? Well the two bedrooms are on the ground floor and open to the rear compact northerly courtyard, there’s also a large single garage, family bathroom and concealed laundry. Ascend a set of polished stairs to the open plan living with contemporary stone topped kitchen with an open lofty dining/ family area, a separate sitting room which with loft doors and a study nook. A powder room with shower is central to the configuration.
For the brave of heart there’s a ladder style stair that ascends to the loft attic with rustic beams in the upper roof line of the dwelling, which could be another bedroom, office or retreat.
With ducted heating and air conditioning, this contemporary inner sanctum has richly polished hardwood floors, neutral colour schemes and takes advantage of its northern aspect through large frosted glazings.
Around the corner from the village you’ll own one of the more unique and talked about homes in the area.
Insights: 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
This Home Shouts Welcome!
This charming semi-detached Edwardian home is set on a wider than usual (267 sqm. approx.) allotment with a sunny north facing rear aspect. Comfortable and thoroughly maintained throughout, you can move straight in and enjoy. Alternatively, improve at your leisure or go for an exciting and profitable renovation project. Wonderfully bright and spacious accommodation comprises wide entry hall, two double bedrooms, separate living and dining rooms, bathroom and kitchen enjoying garden outlook. You will also love the location - just metres from the Yarra Parklands and Dights Falls. Take advantage of the extensive network of bike paths or hike along the river to the Collingwood Children's Farm. Home buyers and investors must make time to inspect this value packed home!
Peter Bennett : 0419 502 466

Address: C/25 Grant Street Clifton Hill VIC 3068
Description:
SECURE & BRILLIANTLY LOCATED...
Nestled in the heart of Clifton Hill Village with public transport, specialty shopping and renowned eateries all at hand you’ll find this contemporary apartment in a well maintained complex (circa 1999) that offers a superb inner city lifestyle.
Enjoying modern open plan living and bathed in natural light the apartment offers 2 spacious bedrooms with built in robes, generous living/dining, well appointed kitchen with plenty of storage, bathroom with shower over bath, concealed laundry and undercover outdoor entertainment area.
Features include full security entry with intercom access, split system heating/cooling, electric panel heating, gas cooking, dishwasher, ample storage and remote basement car parking for one car.
Currently leased to a wonderful tenant who has been in occupation since 2008 this property would make an ideal home for the devoted inner city single or couple or an outstanding ongoing investment.

Description:
Auction This Saturday at 11.00am View from 10.45am
WHAT LIES BEHIND THE FACADE?
This former shop and dwelling undertook a stylish architect designed transformation some years ago to create a contemporary abode blending the charm of the period with a modern twist. The expansive ground floor entry reveals behind the red door with high ceilings and an eclectic original linoleum floor blending to a terra cotta tiled rear section with central powder room, adjoining laundry and modern kitchen with meals area opening vi multiple French doors to the rear garden with lock up garage.
Upstairs are three genuine bedrooms, the front taking full advantage of the width and northern outlook over the street plus a central family bathroom. There’s enough period features retained with open fire places to create a warm atmosphere coupled with the inclusion of hydronic heating, modern lighting systems plus a few surprises that will further capture your imagination.
If the property itself doesn’t whet the appetite sufficiently look at the locality ... in a village side proximity with the Royal Hotel, Cafe Quince and on top of the Station you’ll hunt a long time to find better value for money.
AH Steve Earl - 0432 685 173

Description:
RENOVATED VICTORIAN, PARKLAND POSITION
This light-filled corner residence is a Clifton Hill classic! Tastefully renovated, with scope for an upper level extension (STCA), it is superbly situated close to Dight's Falls, parkland, schools and transport. Fusing charming period detail with contemporary style, here are two double bedrooms with open fireplaces and new BIRs, a spacious living and dining room open to a smart kitchen (Caesarstone benchtops, premium cabinetry and Blanco appliances) and a stylish bathroom/laundry with overbath shower. A wall of north-facing glass links the living zone to a courtyard garden with potential car access. Features include attic storage, polished Baltic floors, plantation shutters and reverse-cycle airconditioning.

Description:
SECLUDED CONTEMPORARY STYLE
This elegant residence offers very spacious low-maintenance living just 15 minutes from the CBD, and close to Yarra parkland, transport and Village cafes. A carefully zoned floor plan includes an expansive living and dining room with study area, flowing to a wide private balcony, stylish kitchen (stone benchtops, quality cabinetry), and two double bedrooms (BIRs) adjoining a sleek bathroom and separate laundry with second WC. Including an internal-entry garage, this appealing property features split-system airconditioning, premium fittings and generous storage.
Insights: 10 Stan Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2014 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
PRIME VICTORIAN, 2 STREET FRONTAGES
This substantial freestanding Victorian residence on a large block (306.5m2 approx) with a second street frontage and off-street parking to George Street offers a brilliant opportunity to renovate and extend (STCA) in a prized location close to Yarra parkland, schools, Clifton Hill Station and Village cafes. With original and 1930s decorative detail and lots of natural light, it comprises 2 double bedrooms from an arched hallway, spacious living room with gas heater, large kitchen/meals, neat bathroom, laundry and separate WC. Don't miss it!
Insights: 33 O'Grady Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2019 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
STUNNING ECO-EFFICIENT VICTORIAN
This elegant block-fronted family residence, superbly located close to parklands, Village cafes/shops, schools & transport, showcases the latest Passive House technology. Featuring ducted heat recovery ventilation, premium double glazing, a 2220w solar panel system, hydronic and underfloor heating, this amazing light-filled home offers a free-flowing floor plan comprising 3 very large bedrooms (incl: 1st floor master suite/retreat), 2 stylish bathrooms (ensuite), designer kitchen (premium appliances and concealed laundry), expansive living & dining zones with large glass door opening to a private north-facing courtyard garden (ROW). Including vast loft storage and bespoke cabinetry throughout, this exceptional property features period detail, polished timber and concrete floors, reverse cycle air conditioning, premium appointments & more. A must see!
Note frontage : 12.19 m approx. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 4 Walker Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2014 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Roomy Classic Ready for Rejuvenation
This double block-fronted Victorian has it all covered for those desiring space, period appeal, north-facing rear, excellent ROW and outstanding potential in a central village position. It's time to add your definitive touch to this charming 7-room home on 415 sqm (approx) and make a sublime statement in contemporary inner-city living close to cafes, shops, great schools, Clifton Hill station and extensive parklands and trails. Nestled behind a classic heritage facade and looking forward to stylish rejuvenation, this long-held home is filled with character including arched hallway, four bedrooms, two bathrooms, living room, lounge, sitting area, kitchen/meals, powder room, sheltered alfresco areas, open fireplaces, high ceiling roses and massive garage.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128
Insights: 58 Ramsden Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2014 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.
